# VMX Creation Behavior

**API Collection**

An enumeration that describes VMX creation behavior options.

## Behavior

- **VMX_BASIC_TRUE_CTLS**: This bit field, in the value returned by the IA32_VMX_BASIC model specific register, determines if it’s possible to disable any VMX controls.

## Shared types

- **VMX Exit Reasons**: An enumertion that describes the VMX exit reasons.
- **Interrupt request (IRQ) codes**: An enumeration that describes available interrupt codes.
